### ipfsadd

one liner to upload files to [IPFS](https://ipfs.io/)

#### Quick Use

```sh
curl -fsSL https://tools.maximousblk.now.sh/ipfsadd.sh | bash -s -- [...FILES]
```

#### Install

```sh
curl -fsSL https://tools.maximousblk.now.sh/ipfsadd.sh > ~/bin/ipfsadd
chmod +x ~/bin/ipfsadd

ipfsadd [...FILES]
```

<br>
